post.body: you gonna see Maximino
did u buy the scanner? What do you use it for, your business?
230 Tuesday AM. We're at the hotel. G'night.
dramatic landing at LaGuardia...hard left over the water passing the new stadium and a screeching halt.....ok not screeching, but very abrup
should I be like, 'hey dude, you OK?' Not 100% it's him....better leave it quiet.....well kinda quiet.
Now he's sitting in the next stall & it sounds like he's crying....sniffling. This is awkward & not why I came in here.
He said referring to her yelling him down earlier, 'Theres no excuse talking to me in public the way I'm talking to you right now.' What?
listening to a family fight outside the men's room. Don't you just love holiday bliss...daddy sounds mad.
delayed in cincy until 1130. Holiday travel fun!
hoping we'll catch our connecting flight In Cincinnatti to NYC
hoping we'll catch our conecting flight In Cincinnatti to NYC
trying to get my list together & praying all our connections are on time...
just making the most of a good day with my kin folk.
thinking warm thoughts
If aliens landed today, how would they complete this phrase: 'Tis the season to...
Don't got the grocery store today, trust me. Many unhappy shoppers & motorists
empty, old churches are creepy but inspire prayer.
bebiendo un cafe con leche
Rick Warren on Dateline tonight. Looks like he's in the thick of controversy once again.
Let it snow, let it snow, let it snow then let it stop so we can catch our flight outta here on Monday.
